titleInfo.title: New Englishes on YouTube: Sociolinguistic Considerations

name.namePart: New Englishes, New Methods (NENM): New Englishes & Sociolinguistics

mods.abstract: Is YouTube really a nightmare for sociolinguistic research and in which scenarios could YouTube data be helpful? Note: This was a 7-minute "Lightning Linguistics" talk at the digital New Englishes, New Methods (NENM) workshop on "New Englishes & Sociolinguistics" on Sep 10, 2020.
